   :format: html

.. |target| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">gct<a href="../18s-tab.html#_18S" title="18S target ?">C</a>cagtag</span>`
.. .. |ortholog| replace:: :raw-html:`yeast <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=.">.</a>, human <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=Homo_sapiens300...">SNOR..</a>`
.. |motif| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">gyyYyagyagtg</span>`



snRcnf04440
===========

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snRcnf04440_h99_igb.png
   :name: snrcnf04440_h99_igb
   :align: left
   :width: 1389 px
   :height: 646 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%

- snRcnf04400_boxCDsnoRNA-in-CNF04440
- Within 5'UTR (CNF04440) or 1\ :sup:`st` intron (CNAG_06573) for an uncharacterized protein with similarity to proteins involved in DNA maintenance

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/cnf04440-blast.png
   :name: cnf04440-blast-align
   :align: left
   :width: 1377 px
   :height: 629 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%



- Predicted target in |targetRNA|\ : |target|
- Homologous position not known to be methylated in plant, human or yeast.


.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snRcnf04440-align.png
   :name: snrcnf04440-align
   :align: left
   :width: 1544 px
   :height: 216 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%


.. rst-class:: mononote


>AE017346.1:c1291294-1291208 Cryptococcus neoformans var. neoformans JEC21 chromosome 6 sequence :raw-html:`</br>`
TTCTCTGATGATACTGCTGGGGCTCCGAGGCCCGTGACGCCATCCCAGCCACATGCTAATCCGGCTCCAC :raw-html:`</br>`
GCCGTACATATCTGACT

|
|
|
|

- Other putative targets in :doc:`snrcnag12093-species` are shown below, found by searching for |motif| in *C.*\ |nbsp|\ *deneoformans*.
- Targets, although not highly expressed, that would be conserved among *Cryptococcus* species, are in `CNG03635, CNAG_07718`_, `CNH03220, CNAG_05312`_, or, `CNC05030, CNAG_02890`_ a.o.
- More widely conserved base-pairing of the guide was found for `CNK01680, CNAG_02680`_, while inteaction with the 5'SS in `CNH01830, CNAG_05532`_ or `CND01470, CNAG_01017`_ could interfere with splicing,
  
:raw-html:`<table><tr><th>&nbsp;<i>C.&nbsp;neoformans</i></th><th>&nbsp;</th><th><i>Tremellomycetes</i> targeted segments</th>`
